verses.text: And it came to pass \add after\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* in the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* thyself unto \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*; and I will \w send|strong="H5414"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* himself unto \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*. And \add there was\add* a \w sore|strong="H2389"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, which \add was\add* the governor of \add his\add* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. (Now \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* \w feared|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*:\f + \fr 18.3 \ft Obadiah: Heb. Obadiahu\f*\f + \fr 18.3 \ft the governor…: Heb. over his house\f*

For it was \add so\add*, when \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* them by \w fifty|strong="H0376"\w* in a \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, and \w fed|strong="H3557"\w* them with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.)\f + \fr 18.4 \ft Jezebel: Heb. Izebel\f*

And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, unto all \w fountains|strong="H4599"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and unto all \w brooks|strong="H5158"\w*: \w peradventure|strong="H0194"\w* we may \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* to \w save|strong="H2421"\w* the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and \w mules|strong="H6505"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, that we \w lose|strong="H3772"\w* not all the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*.\f + \fr 18.5 \ft that…: Heb. that we cut not off ourselves from the beasts\f*

So they \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* between them to pass \w throughout|strong="H5674"\w* it: \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* by himself, and \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* by himself.

¶ And as \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* was in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, behold, \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w met|strong="H7125"\w* him: and he \w knew|strong="H5234"\w* him, and \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* on his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Art\add* thou that my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*?
And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* him, I \add am:\add* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, Behold, \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \add is here\add*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What have I \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, that thou wouldest \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, to \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* me?

\add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, there is \w no|strong="H3426"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* or \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, \w whither|strong="H0834"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* hath not \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thee: and when they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add He is\add* not \add there;\add* he took an \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* and \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, that they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* thee not.
And now thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, Behold, \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \add is here\add*.

And it shall come to pass, \add as soon as\add* I am \w gone|strong="H3212"\w* from thee, that the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* thee whither I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not; and \add so\add* when I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, and he cannot \w find|strong="H4672"\w* thee, he shall \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* me: but I thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* from my \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

Was it not \w told|strong="H5046"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* what I \w did|strong="H6213"\w* when \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, how I \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* by \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* in a \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, and \w fed|strong="H3557"\w* them with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w water|strong="H4325"\w*?

And now thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, Behold, \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \add is here:\add* and he shall \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* me.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* whom I \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, I will surely \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* myself unto him to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

So \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him: and \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, when \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*, that \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \add Art\add* thou he that \w troubleth|strong="H5916"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I have not \w troubled|strong="H5916"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; but thou, and thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, in that ye have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and thou hast \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*.

Now therefore \w send|strong="H7971"\w*, \add and\add* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* to me all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of the \w groves|strong="H0842"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, which \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* at \w Jezebel’s|strong="H0348"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.

So \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w came|strong="H5066"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, How \w long|strong="H5921"\w* \w halt|strong="H6452"\w* ye between \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w opinions|strong="H5587"\w*? if the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add be\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, follow him: but if \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \add then\add* \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* him. And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* him not a \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 18.21 \ft opinions: or, thoughts\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, I, \add even\add* I only, \w remain|strong="H3498"\w* a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; but \w Baal’s|strong="H1168"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \add are\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

Let them therefore \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*; and let them \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* for themselves, and cut it in \w pieces|strong="H5408"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* on \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* no \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \add under:\add* and I will \w dress|strong="H6213"\w* the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* on \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* no \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \add under:\add*

And \w call|strong="H7121"\w* ye on the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of your \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and I will \w call|strong="H7121"\w* on the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* that \w answereth|strong="H6030"\w* by \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, let him be \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It is \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 18.24 \ft It is…: Heb. The word is good\f*

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \w Choose|strong="H0977"\w* you \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* for yourselves, and \w dress|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* \w first|strong="H7223"\w*; for ye \add are\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*; and \w call|strong="H7121"\w* on the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of your \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, but \w put|strong="H7760"\w* no \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \add under\add*.

And they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* which was \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them, and they \w dressed|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* on the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* from \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* even until \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, O \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* us. But \add there was\add* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, nor any that \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*. And they \w leaped|strong="H6452"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* which was \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.\f + \fr 18.26 \ft hear: or, answer\f*\f + \fr 18.26 \ft answered: or, heard\f*\f + \fr 18.26 \ft leaped…: or, leaped up and down at the altar\f*

And it came to pass at \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*, that \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w mocked|strong="H2048"\w* them, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w aloud|strong="H1419"\w*: for he \add is\add* a \w god|strong="H0430"\w*; either he is \w talking|strong="H7879"\w*, or he is \w pursuing|strong="H7873"\w*, or he is in a \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*, \add or\add* \w peradventure|strong="H0194"\w* he \w sleepeth|strong="H3463"\w*, and must be \w awaked|strong="H3364"\w*.\f + \fr 18.27 \ft aloud: Heb. with a great voice\f*\f + \fr 18.27 \ft he is talking: or, he meditateth\f*\f + \fr 18.27 \ft is pursuing: Heb. hath a pursuit\f*

And they \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w aloud|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w cut|strong="H1413"\w* themselves after their \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* with \w knives|strong="H2719"\w* and \w lancets|strong="H7420"\w*, till the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* gushed \w out|strong="H8210"\w* upon them.\f + \fr 18.28 \ft the blood…: Heb. poured out blood upon them\f*

And it came to pass, when \w midday|strong="H6672"\w* was \w past|strong="H5674"\w*, and they \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* until the \add time\add* of the \w offering|strong="H5927"\w* of the \add evening\add* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w*, that \add there was\add* neither \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, nor any to \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*, nor any that \w regarded|strong="H7182"\w*.\f + \fr 18.29 \ft offering: Heb. ascending\f*\f + \fr 18.29 \ft that regarded: Heb. attention\f*

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Come \w near|strong="H5066"\w* unto me. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* came \w near|strong="H5066"\w* unto him. And he \w repaired|strong="H7495"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add that was\add* broken \w down|strong="H2040"\w*.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, unto whom the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*:

And with the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w trench|strong="H8585"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, as great as would \w contain|strong="H1004"\w* two \w measures|strong="H5429"\w* of \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*.

And he \w put|strong="H6186"\w* the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* in \w order|strong="H6186"\w*, and \w cut|strong="H5408"\w* the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* in pieces, and \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \add him\add* on the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w barrels|strong="H3537"\w* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \add it\add* on the burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w*, and on the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Do \add it\add* the second \w time|strong="H8138"\w*. And they did \add it\add* the second \w time|strong="H8138"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Do \add it\add* the third \w time|strong="H8027"\w*. And they did \add it\add* the third \w time|strong="H8027"\w*.

And the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w ran|strong="H3212"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; and he \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w trench|strong="H8585"\w* also with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.\f + \fr 18.35 \ft ran: Heb. went\f*

And it came to pass at \add the time of\add* the \w offering|strong="H5927"\w* of the \add evening\add* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w*, that \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* came \w near|strong="H5066"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, let it be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that thou \add art\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \add that\add* I \add am\add* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and \add that\add* I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* all these things at thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H6030"\w* me, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* me, that this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that thou \add art\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \add that\add* thou hast \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w back|strong="H5437"\w* \w again|strong="H0322"\w*.

Then the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w*, and \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* the burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w*, and the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, and licked \w up|strong="H3897"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* that \add was\add* in the \w trench|strong="H8585"\w*.

And when all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, they \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* on their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*: and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, he \add is\add* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, he \add is\add* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Take|strong="H8610"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*; let not \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of them \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*. And they \w took|strong="H8610"\w* them: and \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* brought them \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kishon|strong="H7028"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* them there.\f + \fr 18.40 \ft Take: or, Apprehend\f*

¶ And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, Get thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*; for \add there is\add* a \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of \w abundance|strong="H1995"\w* of \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*.\f + \fr 18.41 \ft a sound…: or, a sound of a noise of rain\f*

So \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*. And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*; and he cast himself \w down|strong="H1457"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* between his \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* now, \w look|strong="H5027"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*. And he went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w looked|strong="H5027"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add There is\add* \w nothing|strong="H3972"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*.

And it came to pass at the seventh \w time|strong="H7637"\w*, that he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, there \w ariseth|strong="H5927"\w* a \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w cloud|strong="H5645"\w* out of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, like a \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, \w Prepare|strong="H0631"\w* \add thy chariot\add*, and get thee \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, that the \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* \w stop|strong="H6113"\w* thee not.\f + \fr 18.44 \ft Prepare: Heb. Tie, or, Bind\f*

And it came to pass in the mean \w while|strong="H3541"\w*, that the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* was \w black|strong="H6937"\w* with \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* and \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, and there was a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*. And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w rode|strong="H7392"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.

And the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was on \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*; and he girded \w up|strong="H8151"\w* his \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* to the \w entrance|strong="H0935"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.\f + \fr 18.46 \ft to the…: Heb. till thou come to Jezreel\f*
